name: integration-tester-browser-extension
description: Sovendus integration tester chrome & firefox extensions

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-release: npm run build-and-test --buildMode && npm run zip-builds
scripts.build-ts: npm run clean && tsc --build && rimraf build/chrome/tests
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build-test-zips && npm run test
scripts.build-and-test-it: npm run build-test-zips && npm run test-it
scripts.build-test-zips: npm run lint && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-files && npm run zip-builds-for-tests
scripts.copy-files: npm run copy-other-files && npm run copy-to-ff && npm run copy-browser-specific-files && npm run copy-icon
scripts.copy-to-ff: copyfiles --flat build/chrome/extension-pop-up/* build/firefox/extension-pop-up && copyfiles --flat build/chrome/extension-pop-up/export-result/* build/firefox/extension-pop-up/export-result && copyfiles --flat build/chrome/page-banner/* build/firefox/page-banner
scripts.copy-browser-specific-files: copyfiles --flat src/chrome/* build/chrome && copyfiles --flat src/firefox/* build/firefox
scripts.copy-icon: copyfiles --flat src/sovendus.png build/firefox/ && copyfiles --flat src/sovendus.png build/chrome/
scripts.zip-builds: zip-build build/chrome release_zips -t 'chrome-test-sovendus-integration_%VERSION%_%TIMESTAMP%.%EXT%' && zip-build build/firefox release_zips -t 'firefox-test-sovendus-integration_%VERSION%_%TIMESTAMP%.%EXT%'
scripts.zip-builds-for-tests: rimraf test_zips/chrome-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.crx && zip-build build/chrome test_zips -t 'chrome-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.crx' && rimraf test_zips/firefox-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.xpi &&  zip-build build/firefox test_zips -t 'firefox-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.xpi'

author: Marcus Brandstaetter - Sovendus GmbH
